meanings.sent1: The fallen tree was a big impediment on the path.
meanings.sent2: Financial difficulties can be major impediments to success.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn vending machine was an impediment to getting a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of failure acted as an impediment to pursuing her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The thick fog created an impediment to visibility on the road.

meanings.definition: Something that hinders progress or movement
meanings.sent1: Lack of transportation can be a significant impediment to attending school.
meanings.sent2: Technical issues are common impediments in the IT industry.
meanings.sent3: The slow internet connection was an unexpected impediment during the online meeting.
meanings.sent4: Miscommunication can act as an impediment to building strong relationships.
meanings.sent5: The heavy traffic was a frustrating impediment to reaching the airport on time.
